alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Cumberland (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 8:07PM EDT until June 22 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Clinton County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Cumberland County in south central Kentucky... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were from 7 miles east of Burkesville to 7 miles northeast of Celina, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Littrell, Snow, Savage, Highway, Ida, Modoc, Green Grove, Rolan, and Decide. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
